Helper class for Executors.

    • newVirtualThreadPerTaskExecutorOrDefault

      public static ExecutorService newVirtualThreadPerTaskExecutorOrDefault(ExecutorsHelper.ExecutorBuilder defaultExecutorBuilder)
      Returns a new virtual-thread-per-task-executor or a new ExecutorService provided by the provided default ExecutorBuilder. If the runtime supports virtual threads or if the system property with the name of USE_VIRTUAL_THREADS_SYSTEM_PROPERTY_NAME is not set to false, a new virtual-thread-per-task-executor is returned. Otherwise, a new ExecutorService is returned by the provided default ExecutorBuilder.
      Parameters:
      defaultExecutorBuilder - the provided default ExecutorBuilder
      Returns:
      a new virtual-thread-per-task-executor or a new ExecutorService provided by the provided default ExecutorBuilder
